miniatures.title: Gatekeeper: Eclipse closes on July 10!
miniatures.author: d3lt4run3
miniatures.contents:
Greetings, Gatekeepers!
We want to express our deep gratitude to our incredible community, whose unwavering support has been invaluable throughout the launch of Gatekeeper: Eclipse. The journey thus far has been nothing short of extraordinary, with over 100,000 lifetime players, an impressive 685 very positive Steam reviews, and countless feedback and discussions on our  Discord server.[...]

miniatures.title: Public Devlog #12: Beta Wrap Up
miniatures.author: Regolith Interactive
miniatures.contents:
Hello, and welcome to our final steam update for the Beta milestone!

In case you missed it,  a couple of weeks ago we talked a bit about the sounds behind Outpost Rhea, showed off 'The Hydroponics Lab' track from the game's OST, and teased a new track, '"Routine" Maintenance' to be released once we reach 200 Twitter followers:[...]

miniatures.title: New Stars DevLog #11 - Galactic Federations, Unified Fleets, and more...
miniatures.author: adamjr
miniatures.contents: In Part 2 of the 'Interstellar' update, more playmodes are added with the addition of galactic unions - inspired by Stellaris federations, and stealth fleets. Unite the galaxy with Alliance Builders, or build mighty military fleets with Cooperative Militarists.[...]

miniatures.title: Dev Log More Vampires
miniatures.author: danacraig78
miniatures.contents: I have finished redoing the Vampire Dungeon scene for Day 1. The set I had used in the previous one was...ok. However, I found a set that had a much better feel, and didn't just repeat the "Grand Inquisition" dungeon I had used for Andrei Prologue and The Council chapter.[...]

miniatures.title: Mimi the Cat - New Friends now avaliable!
miniatures.author: Wise Box Studios
miniatures.contents:
Mimi, Branco, Nevezinho, Melzinha, Cinzendo, and Negan are real kittens that are or have been part of our lives. It's a joy to immortalize the presence of our beloved felines in this game.
The game is now available![...]

miniatures.title: Development Report No. 1
miniatures.author: LMODE
miniatures.contents:
With Regards to Art & Level Direction
The game's development progress is consistent and we are currently overhauling the player's diegetic HUD to a near final state. Once overhauled, we will be ready for all new preview content for an updated store page and marketing push.[...]

miniatures.title: Bug Fixes

miniatures.contents:

miniatures.author: ÏïºÏûêÍ±∞Î∂Å
miniatures.contents:
Hi, I wanted to share a detailed development schedule and roadmap.
Please note that this schedule is an optimistic target and may actually take a bit longer.
However, we'll try to stick to the schedule as much as possible, and even if we run into problems, we'll still be working hard to complete development within 2023.[...]

miniatures.contents: One year ago today, "Fates Intertwined," performed by the talented artist Raym released. Marking its one-year anniversary, her heartfelt vocals and poignant lyrics beautifully depict the longing of two souls destined to reunite in the afterlife or beyond.[...]

miniatures.title: Life and Death in the Slime Army
miniatures.author: Cloud of Pinky
miniatures.contents: As detailed in  the previous post, the Slime Army is a vast machine consisting of billions of slimes, conscripted from birth to serve when duty calls. Each slime serves in their own way, either raising the faction's GDP through trade, labor and innovation, or more commonly, as soldiers on the front lines, wherever that is.[...]

miniatures.contents: If the Love n War Universe revolves around strategy, intense battles, and winning the hearts of beautiful ladies in a Fantasy world, then the Love n Life series will take you on a vibrant and dynamic adventure through modern life.[...]

miniatures.contents:
This is a terrible mutant, fast-moving, high damage, very cranky, encountered to keep a distance, unless you are too curious.
The design prototype is the Witch in left 4 dead, which is also a tribute to the classic. But there are still differences, there are very different.[...]

miniatures.contents:
Hi there!üòç
Welcome to the Cooking Simulator 2: Better Together! We‚Äôre bringing the Cooking Simulator to the next level where you can also play with your friends![...]

miniatures.title: Chickenauts Gameplay Showcase!
miniatures.author: martynas.siskauskas
miniatures.contents:
Let's celebrate the festival with the gameplay showcase from the developers of Chickenauts!
Chickenauts is a fast paced, action roguelike game where you battle Alien Chickens who've abducted your beloved flock. Tackle a myriad of foes, undergo strategic mutations, loot prizes, and wield powerful weapons.[...]

miniatures.title: 21/06/2023 bug fixes
miniatures.author: Alex
miniatures.contents:
Hello everyone,
Based on player feedback and suggestions, we have fixed some issues present in the game.
Fixed:
Fixed crash issues.
Adjusted the auto-save function from when the menu is opened to when it is closed.[...]

miniatures.title: Personal Pets!
miniatures.author: Dawid_Gameparic
miniatures.contents:
Hello Trainers! üëã


We‚Äôre back with another update from our animal training facility! ü§© Today we‚Äôd like introduce you to something you‚Äôve frequently asked for.[...]

miniatures.title: New models of our main characters!
miniatures.author: merc.std
miniatures.contents:
We promised ‚Äì we show! üòÉ
You have often said that you don't really like the way our characters look and we decided to do it! In general, we are ready to finally show new models of our main characters!
[...]

miniatures.title: Watch as the solo GeoDepths developer plays his own demo
miniatures.author: Matherno
miniatures.contents:
Enjoy some gameplay of GeoDepths, my drill mining game that I have been working on for over a year part time, in between working a full time job and keeping up a social life XD.
This is just prerecorded gameplay, but feel free to join either of two scheduled livestreams for chats with the developer.[...]

miniatures.title: Demo has been released
miniatures.author: SleepyValley
miniatures.contents:
Free Demo has been released on Next Fest. Let's give it a try. We will continue to follow your feedback and keep the game updated and improved
[...]

miniatures.title: Reloading
miniatures.author: [IT] highcla
miniatures.contents:
Hey, everyone!
Considering the very positive reception of the idea on Discord, i'm implementing a reload system for all the weapons.
It wasn't there from the beginning, deliberately, to give EMPTY SHELL more of a "Quake" vibe, but the game is shaping up in a way that a reload system would fit nicely.[...]

miniatures.title: Citadel Stormer 2 | DEMO
miniatures.author: Pixeltroid
miniatures.contents:
Blast your way through a world of deadly robots and monstrous machines in this explosive run-and-gun action platformer inspired by '90s classics!
[...]

miniatures.title: Bloody Downsizing Demo Stream
miniatures.author: Gadan Games
miniatures.contents: Join us for an action-packed live stream of Bloody Downsizing! Developer gameplay, epic slow-motion kills, and Q&A await. Don't miss the intense rogue-lite arena shooter. Save the date and get ready to conquer the corporate chaos![...]

miniatures.title: Working on translations
miniatures.author: 68k Studios
miniatures.contents:
Hi,
I've probably find an "easy" way to manage translations (and I do not mean using automated translations!), so I've decided to add a couple of languages to the game. The first one is the Italian language, because it's easier for me.[...]

miniatures.title: Demo OST Released
miniatures.author: ChairGTables
miniatures.contents:
Now that our demo is available for everyone to play, you too can enjoy all the tracks you encountered in the demo so far. Experience all the songs at their highest quality in Bandcamp.
 
 Click here to view the official soundtrack[...]
miniatures.appName: Hazuki Dies: She Has No Name

miniatures.title: Explore Historic Monuments and Solve Puzzles in Our Exciting New Game!
miniatures.author: Tribus Games Indie
miniatures.contents: Discover historic monuments with our puzzle game! With 20 incredible images and 5 levels of difficulty, this game will challenge your mind and take you on a journey through history. Test your skills in free mode or challenge mode.[...]

miniatures.title: Guards II News #7. World #3 Bestiary.
miniatures.author: Rurik
miniatures.contents:
Hello,

We are excited to share the progress of our game's development. This week, we focused on designing the battle GUI, which was a time-consuming task. However, the result is fantastic, and we will soon showcase it to you.[...]

miniatures.title: Update V0.514
miniatures.author: ut-studio
miniatures.contents:
‚Ä¢ Added the function of automatically hiding the mouse during flight
‚Ä¢ Fixed the issue where the race could not be reset using the controller button after finishing in racing mode
‚Ä¢ Fixed the issue where channels were repeatedly recognized during remote control settings[...]

miniatures.title: DungeonSmash
miniatures.author: lawlieT
miniatures.contents:
DungeonSmash is a simple and addictive game where you break blocks in medieval dungeons. Create your own levels and play the maps of others and receive ratings, prizes, and hours of entertainment.
[...]

miniatures.title: The joystick update.
miniatures.author: granideagames
miniatures.contents:
Several problems with the use of joystick and others with the new items added in the last big update have been fixed.
[...]

miniatures.title: Conquer Humanity Live Stream
miniatures.author: adi_zhavo
miniatures.contents:
Hello,
I'm happy and nervous at the same time to announce that I'm taking part of Steam Next Fest livestream showcasing the Demo of Conquer Humanity.
Why nervous ? Well I'm aware the demo has a lot more work needed but at the same time this is a great opportunity to get feedback early and improve as a solo dev :)[...]

miniatures.title: üî´ KEY DROPS & DEV LIVESTREAM üî¥
miniatures.author: stevel
miniatures.contents:
Hello Bullet Hell fans!
Join us for an exciting developer live stream during Steam Next Fest! Tune in to watch Robin play and talk gameplay reveals, behind-the-scenes insights, and a chance to win a free Steam code![...]

miniatures.title: Fixed a single issue with metal ladders
miniatures.author: CoolJosh3k .com
miniatures.contents:
1687284070
* Fixed ladders in time stage still pulling the player upward while time power is active
[...]

miniatures.title: üå∫ Anime Girls üå∫
miniatures.author: HOLYPERSON
miniatures.contents:
LINK We are excited to write down our first blog. We have been working on our game for a while and it will be
available for you to try on Steam Next Fest 19 June 2023.
You‚Äôll also be able to join the developer stream on June 19th, 2023.[...]

miniatures.title: An Everyday Story Developer Let's Play
miniatures.author: CactusProduction
miniatures.contents:
Roberto and Alessio will be online to discuss the process of creating An Everyday Story to answer all your questions and give insights.
Please join us and feel free to share the game, it really helps us a lot <3 [...]

miniatures.title: A Void Hope Demo playthrough!
miniatures.author: Elden Pixels
miniatures.contents:
Watch the developers of A Void Hope play the demo!
[...]

miniatures.title: Watch The Solo Developer Play & AMA [Trigger Warning: Insane Amount of Blood]
miniatures.author: Jocellyn
miniatures.contents: Snowscapes is a bloody simulation game where you observe the frozen world and influence it by playing various cards. You can spawn animals into the world and you can make them kill each other - trigger warning, there will be an insane amount of blood.[...]

miniatures.title: 230620 Update
miniatures.author: ÁãÆÂ≠ê
miniatures.contents:
# Fixing Remote Connection Crash Issue on Some Models
We are currently working on addressing a crash issue that occurs when using the boss key and attempting remote connections, particularly on a small number of laptops.[...]

miniatures.title: Not For Broadcast VR Patch 2 Notes
miniatures.author: robbie.palmer
miniatures.contents:
Hello Broadcasters!
We‚Äôve just pushed live an update that fixes a few issues. Here are the latest patch notes:
  • "Remote interactions" accessibility option is added for sitting/limited space gameplay
  • Final broadcast bug was fixed (footage was playing regardless if player wanted it to play or not)
  • Players now get automatically re-centered when a new scene starts
  • Other minor fixes and improvements
[...]

miniatures.title: Check out Shiba Inu demo on Steam Next Fest!
miniatures.author: Quilliano
miniatures.contents:
We're excited to be part of this Steam Next Fest. Download our demo and experience the dystopian sci-fi world of dogs!
LINK On a side note, our sister studio, Quill Yuri, is publishing "Lachesis or Atropos", a horror mystery yuri visual novel by 4noki.[...]

miniatures.title: UPDATE: July 18th release date for Lachesis or Atropos
miniatures.author: Quilliano
miniatures.contents:
Quill Yuri is excited to announce we're publishing 4noki's horror mystery yuri visual novel, Lachesis or Atropos, on Steam.
We pushed the date on Valve's recommendation; the previous date had reduced algorithm visibility due to overlap with the Summer Sale.[...]

miniatures.title: Stand-Alone Dev Log #1
miniatures.author: lifuelgames
miniatures.contents:
Hello, this is Lifuel, developing Stand-Alone.
We've decided to start this development diary to share various challenges
we've faced in the process of developing Stand-Alone and the principles we adhere to.
We also hope to grow through your feedback and interactions.[...]

miniatures.title: 0.5.0-a New features, tweaks and fixes
miniatures.author: CtrlD Studio Dev Team
miniatures.contents:
NEW FEATURES


  • Added volume control for Master, Music, SFX.
  • Added credits.
  • You can now skip wave countdown by pressing "P".
  • Spikes and Single Shooter will now be auto equipped when entering level.[...]

miniatures.title: Another Bar Game Demo Showcase
miniatures.author: arik
miniatures.contents:
Showcasing the newest demo for my upcoming title, Another Bar Game
It's a casual action game with elements of time management, simulation, and challenging. In this game, you serve craft beer to thirsty bar guests and strive to keep everyone happy.[...]

miniatures.title: BugFixed2023/06/20
miniatures.author: OLAY
miniatures.contents:
Boss Level Bug Fixes:
Fixed an issue where the arm would get stuck when exiting skill mode during rewind.
Adjusted the values to address input delay causing the stone wall in the third stage to not descend properly.[...]

miniatures.title: 200623 Patch Notes
miniatures.author: HalfwishDev69
miniatures.contents:
- Changes:
- Tutorial Controls changed so that users can now interact with cards in Tutorial (Action Cards / Power / Adventure)
- Per game lamp limit changed as per requested
- Status Icons updated design (Overshield and Zen Stance)[...]

miniatures.title: Demo Update - Patch Notes 1.0.5
miniatures.author: Finsrud Games
miniatures.contents:
Bug Fixes:


  • Fixed a game breaking bug which made the game un-playable if you left during warmup and then joined back.
  • Fixed a game breaking bug which sometimes made the ship not able to shoot or use abilities after a match was restarted.[...]

miniatures.contents:
Come check out the live demo of our game, and ask any questions that you might have!

miniatures.title: This Week's Devlog: School Holiday! (25th Week of 2023)
miniatures.author: NoxiousFox
miniatures.contents: Hello everyone! Welcome to the first weekly devlog on Steam! Every week, I will post a new blog about the game's progress. And I will also probably post these blogs on my website. So, here's what I have added from april / may until now.[...]

miniatures.title: 6Êúà20Âè∑Êõ¥Êñ∞ËØ¥Êòé

miniatures.title: Ancient alphabet in Sunset Moon

miniatures.contents: This week I show you how I made an ancient alphabet that will appear in my game, by using my 2 year old child's mind. My brother and I managed to figure out the alphabet appearing in Morrowind back in the day and I really enjoyed it.[...]

miniatures.title: First patch ever!! Version 1.002 is out!
miniatures.author: pandamander.games
miniatures.contents:
Thanks to everyone who has tried out the game so far! Our first patch is some quality of life fixes that didn't make it in for the release, including:
  • Mouse is now hidden when the game is in PLAY mode
  • Splash sound effects now play when you jump into the water
  • Swimming in the water is generally easier and faster now
  • Added very exciting VERSION NUMBERS so you can tell what version you have![...]
